items.text_for_match: Arsenal lacked quality and composure - Williams BBC Sport pundits Fara Williams and Anita Asante analyse Arsenal's attacking quality during their 1-0 Women's Super League win over Brighton. BBC Sport pundits Fara Williams and Anita Asante analyse Arsenal's attacking quality during their 1-0 Women's Super League win over Brighton.

items.ja: How have the big-name striker signings done so far in the Premier League?
items.en: How have the big-name striker signings done so far in the Premier League?
items.text_for_match: How have the big-name striker signings done so far in the Premier League? Strikers dominated the summer transfer window and we have taken a look at how nine of them have done since their moves. items.text_for_match: Newcastle name Forest's Wilson as sporting director Newcastle United appoint Nottingham Forest's chief football officer Ross Wilson as sporting director. Newcastle United appoint Nottingham Forest's chief football officer Ross Wilson as sporting director.
